column2: "Dɛm mber no mu no

column6: "Me yamu hyehye me ma nyimpadodow yi
column7: osiandɛ wɔatsena me nkyɛn ndaansa yi na wonnyi biribi a woridzi;"

column2: "sɛ migya hɔn kwan ma wɔdze kɔm kɔ fie a
column3: wɔbɔtotɔ bitsi wɔ kwan mu
column4: osiandɛ hɔn mu binom fi ekyirekyir bae."

column2: "Na n'esuafo no buaa no dɛ
column3: Henfa na nyimpa benya paanoo a ɔdze bɛmee yinom wɔ sar yi do ha?"

column2: "Na Jesus bisaa hɔn dɛ
column3: Paanoo ahen na hom wɔ?  Na wɔsee dɛ

column2: "Na ɔhyɛɛ nyimpadodow no dɛ wɔntsena famu
column3: na ɔfaa paanoo esuon no
column6: na ɔdze maa n'esuafo no dɛ wɔmfa ntoto hɔn enyim; na wɔdze totoo nyimpadodow no enyim."

column2: "Nna wɔwɔ esunam kakraba bi
column3: na ohyiraa do na ɔkaa dɛ wɔmfa no so ntoto hɔn enyim."

column2: "Na wodzidzii mee
column3: na wɔtasee mporoporoba a ɔkae no nkɛntsɛn esuon."

column2: "Nna nyimpa no bɛyɛ mpemanan. Na Jesus gyaa hɔn kwan."
"Na ntsɛmara ɔnye n'esuafo no kɔr hɛn mu na ɔbaa Dalmanuta afamu."
"Na Farisiifo no bae
column3: na wɔhyɛɛ ase nye no yiyii nsɛm ano
column4: hwehwɛɛ asɛnkyerɛdze bi a ofi sor

column2: "Na osii nkrum kɛse wɔ no sunsum mu
column3: na ɔsee dɛ

column5: Wɔremmfa asɛnkyerɛdze biara mma ɔsantsen yi."

column2: "Na ogyaa hɔn hɔ
column3: na ɔtsenaa hɛn mu bio kɔr esuegya noho."

column2: "Na hɔn werɛ fiir dɛ wɔbɛfa paanoo
column3: nna wonnyi biribi wɔ hɛn no mu wɔ hɔn nkyɛn dɛ paanoo kor pɛ."

column2: "Na ɔhyɛɛ hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom nhwɛ yie wɔ Farisiifo mbɔrkaw nye Herod no mbɔrkaw ho."

column2: "Na wosusui sesee hɔnho dɛ

column2: "Na Jesus hunii no

column5: eso hom nntse ase? Hom akoma epirim anaa?"

column2: "Ana hom wɔ enyiwa naaso hom nnhu adze? Na hom wɔ aso na hom nntse? Ana hom nnkaa?"
"Mububuu paanoo enum maa mpemenum no

column2: "Na esuon no so a memaa mpemanan no
column3: mporoporoba mbirefi ma ahen na hom tasee?  Na wɔsee dɛ

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Ana hom da ho nntse ase?"

column2: "Na wɔbaa Bɛtsaeda; na wɔdze onyifurafo bi brɛɛ no
column3: na wɔserɛɛ no dɛ ɔmfa ne nsa nka no."

column2: "Na osuoo onyifurafo no ne nsamu dze no fii ekuroba no mu; na ɔtoo ntafi guu n'enyiwa do
column3: na ɔdze ne nsa too no do no

column2: "Na ɔmaa n'enyiwa do
column3: na ɔsee dɛ

column3: ma ɔhwɛɛ n'enyim tɔɔtsenn

column2: "Na ɔmaa ɔkɔr ne fie see no dɛ
column3: Mma nnkɔ ekuroba no mu hɔ mpo."

column2: "Na Jesus nye n'esuafo no fii hɔ kɔr Kaesarea Filipi nkuroba no mu; na obisaa n'esuafo no wɔ kwan mu dɛ

column2: "Na obiara a ɔpɛ dɛ ɔgye ne kra nkwa no

column2: "Na sɛ nyimpa nya wiadze nyina ma ntsi ɔhwer no nkwa a
column3: ebɛn mfaso na obenya?"

column2: "Na ebɛnadze na nyimpa bɛma dze asesa no nkwa?"
"Osiandɛ obiara a n'enyi bɔto emi nye me nsɛm ho wɔ awartofo nye ndzebɔnyɛfo santsen yi mu no
